subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[metropolis]]; large [[city]]
# [[capital]]; capital [[city]]
# {{†}} to make a place the [[capital]] city; to [[establish]] a capital
# {{†}} [[graceful]]; [[elegant]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}} [[Du]]
# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[all]]
#: {{zh-x|大都{dū}|generally}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* When negating {{lang|zh|都}}, the placement of {{zh-l|不}} is important.
: {{lang|zh|不都}}: not all, not everyone.
: {{lang|zh|都不}}: none, no one
